title: Danielle Deadwyler Is the Beating Heart of ‘Till’
description: After critically acclaimed turns in “Station Eleven” and “The Harder They Fall,” her latest role hit close to home. That’s why she was hesitant to take it on.
dc:creator: Sarah Bahr
media:credit: Simone Niamani Thompson for The New York Times
media:description: Danielle Deadwyler had trepidations about playing Emmett Till’s mother “because it’s a joyous endeavor, but it’s a painful one, too.”
